backend/main.mo: Defines core Motoko types for users, lobbies, tournaments, transactions, gameplay states, and includes blob storage mixin but truncates before logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report stub with an empty feature list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists frontend file summaries describing hooks, components, wallet logic, styling, and placeholders.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app wrapper managing tabs, wallet auto-connect, admin checks, quick play routing, and theme/query providers.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettings.ts: Admin dashboard letting admins view system stats and update house cut percentage.
frontend/src/components/BackendConnectiv: Badge component showing backend connection status with retry/error tooltips.
frontend/src/components/DepositWithdrawM: Modal for deposits and withdrawals with Flexa payment flow, polling, validation, and wallet integration.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with branding and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/GoLiveHelp.tsx: Provides a help card explaining how to publish an app live on the Internet Computer, including draft vs live workflows and ICP gateway link info.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main app header with wallet connection, game mode toggle, backend status, and deposit/withdraw modals.
frontend/src/components/LivePublishStatu: Displays current site origin, ICP public link, and build metadata with clipboard copy actions.
frontend/src/components/LobbyBrowser.tsx: Shows lobby browsing placeholders and provides Quick Play buttons for Spades or Omaha against AI.
frontend/src/components/LobbyRoom.tsx: Placeholder component for future multiplayer lobby rooms.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Handles creating user profiles in real or fun mode, generating guest addresses, and saving profile data to backend or local storage.
frontend/src/components/QuickPlayGame.ts: Displays a basic game screen for Spades or Omaha with an exit button and a placeholder for upcoming gameplay UI.
frontend/src/components/TournamentSectio: Shows a tournaments overview with badges and descriptions, indicating features coming soon for both real and fun modes.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnectMod: Modal for connecting via WalletConnect, offering QR scanning or mobile deep links and copy-to-clipboard URI support.
frontend/src/components/WalletInstallMod: Modal prompting users to install a browser wallet, providing links to Coinbase Wallet and MetaMask.
frontend/src/components/WalletSection.ts: Displays wallet stats, balance, transactions, and supports deposit/withdraw modals for real or fun modes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithRetry.ts: Wraps useActor with connection state, retry tracking, and user-friendly error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, logout, identity persistence, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as profiles, lobbies, and metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeb3Wallet.ts: React hook managing Web3 wallet state, guest wallet generation, balance fetching, provider detection, and connection logic for injected wallets.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers defining OKLCH-themed colors, animations, gradients, and custom UI styles.
frontend/src/lib/web3modal.ts: Defines Base chain metadata and placeholders for future Web3Modal integration without active wallet logic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient, Internet Identity context, and rendering the App.
frontend/src/utils/icpLinks.ts: Utilities for detecting canister IDs, generating IC public links, and handling clipboard operations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading/storing URL parameters and session values, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and typography using OKLCH variables and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing Crypto Cards architecture, frontend/backend integration, and known issues.
